text: right California Free State is a 1996 role-playing game supplement for Shadowrun published by FASA. ==Contents== California Free State is an area sourcebook that deals with California. ==Reception== Andy Butcher reviewed California Free State for Arcane magazine, rating it a 9 out of 10 overall. Butcher comments that "Regardless of what style of game you play [...] California Free State has a great deal to offer any Shadowrun group. Excellent stuff." ==Reviews== *Shadis #27 (May, 1996) ==References== Category:Shadowrun supplements
title: California Free State
